steps.label: Receive Email Request
steps.detail: The system receives an email request at the endpoint /item/{email_id}/ai-edit.

steps.label: Validate Email ID
steps.detail: The system validates the provided email_id to ensure it exists in the database.

steps.label: Fetch Email Data
steps.detail: The system retrieves the email data associated with the validated email_id from the database.

steps.label: Process AI Editing
steps.detail: The system processes the email content using AI editing services.

steps.label: Generate Edited Email
steps.detail: The system generates the edited version of the email based on AI processing.

steps.label: Return Edited Email
steps.detail: The system returns the edited email to the user as a response.

edge_cases.label: Invalid Email ID
edge_cases.detail: The user provides an email_id that does not exist in the database.

edge_cases.label: AI Processing Error
edge_cases.detail: An error occurs during the AI processing of the email content.

edge_cases.label: Database Connection Failure
edge_cases.detail: The system fails to connect to the database while fetching email data.
